document_data.name: Palaghard Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Palaghard Obarskyr II''' of the [[Obarskyr]] dynasty was a king of [[Cormyr]] in the 13{{th}} century [[DR]], reigning from the {{YearlinkName|1227}} to the {{YearlinkName|1261}}.
document_data.Relationships:
Palaghard was born the second son of King [[Dhalmass Obarskyr]] and Queen [[Jhalass Huntsilver]] in the {{YearlinkName|1214}}. He had two sisters, [[Pelara Obarskyr|Pelara]] and [[Elliira Obarskyr|Elliira]], as well as an older brother, [[Proster Obarskyr|Proster]], who died at the age of 9 in [[1222 DR]].

Palaghard's queen was [[Alendue Wyrvar]]. They had three sons: [[Lhannas Obarskyr|Lhannas]] (who died at the age of 22 in [[1258 DR]]), [[Azoun III|Azoun]] (who would become King Azoun III), and [[Salember Obarskyr|Salember]] (who would be regent after Azoun's death).
